data.title: About
data.meta_site_name: The Irving and Aaronel deRoy Gruber Foundation
data.text:
The Irving and Aaronel deRoy Gruber Foundation was established in 2000 to support and promote the artwork of Aaronel deRoy Gruber (1918-2011) and to engage Pittsburgh-based and regional artists and initiatives connected to sculpture, photography, printmaking and painting.

The Foundationâ€™s Pittsburgh headquarters and curated gallery space is positioned to manifest this purpose through exhibitions, programming, research, and interactions with audiences locally, nationally and internationally.

The Foundation bolsters the imprint of a prominent female artist of the region and of her time, while perpetuating her commitment through its support of contemporary art-making and initiatives.

VIRTUAL GALLERY TOUR
